Package tr.edu.ku.devnull.needforspear.Viewmodel.GameLogicHandlers

Class PlayerLivesHandler

java.lang.Object
tr.edu.ku.devnull.needforspear.Viewmodel.GameLogicHandlers.PlayerLivesHandler
public class PlayerLivesHandler
extends java.lang.Object
This class does the computations to calculate lives of the player using observer pattern
